data.title: CLASS-PT: Nonlinear perturbation theory extension of the Boltzmann code CLASS
data.name: CLASS-PT
data.description: Nonlinear perturbation theory extension of the Boltzmann code CLASS

evidence: "This is a modification of the CLASS code that computes the non-linear power spectra of dark matter and biased tracers in one-loop cosmological perturbation theory" (domain-specific cosmology computation tool).

"Once you are all set, check out this jupyter notebook ... for the examples of working sessions. Here's a simple example of computing the galaxy power spectrum multipoles with CLASS-PT:" (used as an executable analysis tool, not just a library).
"Read these instructions ... for the installation details" and links to notebooks and colab, with no mention of package managers or binaries, implying use via cloning the GitHub repository.
